DOC.brief_summary: This study test safety effectiveness MK0916 patient Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Metabolic Syndrome . This early phase trial specific protocol information progress publicly available time . ( Full information available trial participant ) .
DOC.brief_title: MK0916 Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Metabolic Syndrome ( 0916-005 )
DOC.criteria: Have Type 2 Diabetes 18 65 year age History Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus Have treat insulin past 8 week On weight loss program ongoing weight loss Taking weight loss medication Have surgery require general anesthesia past 30 day plan surgery Have take another investigational drug last 8 week Have active liver disease Have history major surgery involve gastric intestinal bypass
